long_description: The Leatherman Juice Xe6 multitool features a pleasing array of tools. Get the beefy Xe6 and get it all! With a body that is slightly thicker than the Cs4, the Xe6 carries pliers, wire cutters, 4 screwdrivers, saw, awl, diamond-coated file and corkscrew. Includes both a straight-edge blade and a serrated blade, plus a can opener, bottle opener and scissors. Lanyard attachment ensures the your XE6 is always nearby. The Leatherman Juice Xe6 multitool is assembled in the USA with domestic and imported parts.
short_description: The Leatherman Juice Xe6 multitool features a pleasing array of tools. Get the beefy Xe6 and get it all!
